name: Drop It Down
description:
Easy controllable infinite action-runner!

Your task is to avoid all obstacles on your way simultaneously collecting bonuses. All bonuses are unique. Not all bonuses are helpful in the particular moment, so it's up to you to decide to take it or not. Try it!

Features
       • Unique bonus system!
       • Rhythmic catchy music!
       • You can play this game infinitely... literally...
       • Minimalist design, just game, just hardcore!
